abstract: The site, cn.nytimes.com, will feature 30 articles a day, the bulk of them translated from Times articles, but it also will feature original content from China.
snippet: The site, cn.nytimes.com, will feature 30 articles a day, the bulk of them translated from Times articles, but it also will feature original content from China.
lead_paragraph: 9:48 p.m. | Updated The New York Times is introducing a Chinese-language Web site, part of a continuing effort to expand its reach to international readers.

headline.main: The Times Is Introducing a Chinese-Language News Site
headline.print_headline: Times Broadens Its Reach With a Web Site in Chinese
